#summary Release Strategy of new ZScreen builds
#labels Phase-Deploy

New ZScreen releases are uploaded as "Beta"

The new upload remains as "Beta" until any one of the following occurs first without a major issue being reported

 * 2 weeks passes 
 * 500 download count reaches

If one of the above happens without a major issue, the upload is tagged as "Featured". 

If the Beta release is known to have major issues before one of the above happens, the release will be tagged as "Depreciated" and a new build that fixes the issue, will be uploaded as "Beta" in due time.
